attributes.action: Scrap the EU regulations for hgv's  based in the UK
attributes.background: To return to the UK  Driving  Regulations  before we had to adopt the EU  regulations

rejection.details: It's unclear what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take. If there are specific EU regulations relating to HGVs which you do not want to be a requirement in the UK when it leaves the EU, we could accept a petition on that.
